channel.title: Help on getting people to connect to my server
channel.description: Alright i downloaded a source, edited it, compiled and ran and it all went nicely and i connected to localhost on port 5555 and i could get in then i told my friend to connect to my ip at port 5555 but he and no one else can connect, how do i make it so everyone can connect to my server?

item.title: Help on getting people to connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @SnipeTHPS SnipeTHPS
item.description:
@SnipeTHPS wrote:

how do i do that?

Read full topic
